title: Classifying Light Curves

previous.title: Observing Supernovae & Plotting a Light Curve

content: What type of supernova is this? See which template (Ia or IIp) fits the light curve best. Once selected, each template can be scaled up or down (scroll) and repositioned (click and drag) to create the best fit.
